definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: Steve is a high- stepping motorist.
sentences.chinese: 史提夫是一個開快車的駕車者。

sentences.english: It already has the top advance sales in history.
sentences.chinese: 這書已破了史上最高預訂紀錄。

sentences.english: Be known as " cork is regnal " Portuguese the cork that already had hundred years is produced history.
sentences.chinese: 被譽爲“軟木王國”的葡萄牙已有百年的軟木生產史。

sentences.english: Chapter II is mainly about the role of the local history in high school history teaching.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，主要講述鄉土史在高中歷史教學中的作用。

sentences.english: Did anybody notice this year's Emmy's was the gayest award show ever?
sentences.chinese: 就沒人覺得這屆艾美獎是史上最基情四射的一屆嗎？

sentences.english: There was a big, metal door-knocker on Scrooge's door.
sentences.chinese: 在史高基的門上有一個巨大的，金屬的門環。

sentences.english: Sam Sleiman is the Director of Capital Programs and Environmental Affairs for Massport.
sentences.chinese: 山姆史萊蒙，是麻州港務局的環境事理主任。

sentences.english: The coal mining area around Jiaozuo City has a history of nearly 100 years.
sentences.chinese: 焦作市煤礦區是一個有着近百年曆史的老礦區。

sentences.english: It is the striking theme of the ruling history and country history that people are the masters.
sentences.chinese: 人民當家作主成爲黨的執政史和國史的鮮明主題。

sentences.english: Medical History is a specialized history with medicine as the object of study.
sentences.chinese: 醫學史是以醫學爲研究對象的專門史。

sentences.english: Peking Opera in China has a history of approximately 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 京劇在中國約有200年曆史，它是北京的地方戲。

sentences.english: In our history, staging refers to the era before the mid-nineteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 在我國曆史分期上泛指十九世紀中葉以前的時代。

sentences.english: Mr. Stovel have the mechanic fix his car.
sentences.chinese: 史多夫先生讓這個修理工修理他的汽車。

sentences.english: The Smiths are my good friends.
sentences.chinese: 史女人一家人是我的好伴侶。

sentences.english: So, whaddya think George is like?
sentences.chinese: 你們認爲史先生是什麼樣的人？

definition: variant of 記錄|记录[ji4 lu4] (but in Taiwan, not for the verb sense "to record")
to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
